q: In CSS3, you are working on buttons. You have created a website in which you have embedded a button to display an image on your website. You have included the hover effect to this button by using the : hover selector such that when the cursor is placed on the button, the background color of the button changes to green. If you are required to determine the speed of the hover effect on your button, then which of the following properties must be included in the CSS file to perform this task?

In CSS3, you are working on buttons. If you are required to add the shadow effect to your button on your website, then which of the following properties must be included in your CSS file to perform this task?

In CSS3, you are working on buttons. You have created a website in which you have embedded a button to navigate to another webpage of your website. You must design your button by using your CSS file such that it has only a green border color. The button must be filled with white color and the text on the button of black color. Which of the following properties are required in this scenario:
    1. background-color
    2. color
